title: fully furnished  apartment  For Rent ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED water
map_address: 742 SW. 5th Court near Hallandale Beach Boulevard
posting_body: ['Nice clean fully furnished efficiency in quiet area with pool with private entrance', 'efficiency is for (1 )responsible person prefer older lady or gentleman  must have a job  NO SMOKING  the efficiency has a galley style kitchen and comes with stove and side by side fridge  microwave dishes glasses eating utensils', 'has a full bathroom parking space for ONE .', ' the efficiency is walking distance  from grocery store and bus stop $35 nonrefundable background check will be required to move in first month and security', 'the efficiency includes utilities water electric direct TV garbage pick up WI-fi and is fully furnished 27in flat screen tv  NO PETS ALLOWED', 'PLEASE have DEPOSIT and FIRST MONTHS RENT            (  THERE WILL BE A $25 NONREFUNDABLE BACK GROUND CHECK ALSO MUST SHOW PROOF OF EMPLOYMENT)    CALL Donna at', 'show contact info', 'available for showings Feb1 /22']
